advert.title: Nissan QASHQAI+2 1.6 DCI 360 IS PLUS 2 5d 130 BHP Home Delivery Available

heading.title: Nissan QASHQAI+2
heading.subtitle: 1.6 DCI 360 IS PLUS 2 5d 130 BHP Home Delivery Available

marketing.profile:
Advantage Vehicles Ltd. is a family used car business, run by Husband and Wife, selling quality used vehicles throughout the UK. We pride ourselves on offering the professional service of a large company ( Service, MOT Centre and Bodyshop ) but with the service and personal touch demanded by our own standards. After undergoing a comprehensive HPI check, each vehicle is prepared at our workshop prior to sale
We have 14 staff members who have mostly been with us for 5 plus years who know what is required to make us stand out.
We offer a personalised WhatApp video on each vehicle and are available to message 7am-7pm 7 Days a week.
When visiting our sales office you are assured a hassle free experience, with a small kids play area inside to keep the little ones (and sometimes adults!) entertained. 
Visit our website www.advantage-vehicles.co.uk Call 01270 500999 or WhatsApp 07407730749. 
Thanks for reading!

paragraphs: We have clear signs regarding social distancing all around the office and forecourt. Hand sanitizer must be used on entry to the office. Only 1 sales desk will be in use to ensure a safe distance is kept at all times, this desk along with the ones not in use are currently fitted with 100cm x 100cm 'sneeze' screens. Desks and chairs will be sanitized after each customer. All staff will be temperature tested daily. Bank transfer is encouraged and all finance agreements can be completed online.

bulletPoints: Detailed handover to get to know your new vehicle
paragraphs: Advantage Vehicles have just invested in a flat bed truck specifically for delivering customers vehicles. Deliveries will be done by our own staff members to ensure a more personal service. We will do our very best to be as flexible as possible with delivery times and can assure you that this isn't a profit making service, we will just look to cover our costs where possible.
Free delivery up to 25 miles drive. Â£1.00 per mile thereafter

bulletPoints: View the vehicle from your home
Arrange a time to suit you
paragraphs: Hi I'm Simon the owner of Advantage Vehicles Ltd. I will be personally offering customers a walk around 'WhatsApp/Zoom/Skype/Facetime' video on each car. These can be tailored to what you want to see or hear. I'm far from used to doing this so please bare with me and we'll make it a friendly informal experience, with a few laughs along the way I'm sure!. I'll be as flexible as possible with times regarding these videos.

bulletPoints: WhatsApp us on 07407730749 7am-7pm 7 days a week for px valuation, any questions or to reserve a car
14 day no quibble money back guarantee

advert.advertText: Superb Condition Throughout, Looks And Drives Fantastic, Competitive Finance Deals Available, All Major Credit/Debit Cards Accepted, Friendly No Pressure Approach Guaranteed. p/x welcome. WHITE, All Cars Fully HPI Checked, Late Viewing Available By Request, Â£8,995
